refnamediv.refpurpose: Reads a 32-channel audio signal from an external device or stream.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Reads a 32-channel audio signal from an external device or stream.

warning.title: Warning
warning.para: This opcode is designed to be used only with orchestras that have nchnls_i=32. Doing so with orchestras with nchnls_i > 32 will cause incorrect audio input.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: ar1, ar2, ar3, ar4, ar5, ar6, ar7, ar8, ar9, ar10, ar11, ar12, ar13, ar14, \ ar15, ar16, ar17, ar18, ar19, ar20, ar21, ar22, ar23, ar24, ar25, ar26, \ ar27, ar28, ar29, ar30, ar31, ar32 in32

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: in32 reads a 32-channel audio signal from an external device or stream. If the command-line -i flag is set, sound is read continuously from the audio input stream (e.g. stdin or a soundfile) into an internal buffer.
